target: Well if there is nothing else I can help you with, have a great day. Goodbye.
context: <user> I'm looking for a place to stay on the east side that includes free parking. <system> I can help you with that! First, let me get more information so that I can assist you better. Are you looking for a guesthouse or hotel? <user> I would like a hotel with 3 stars and with free wifi please. <system> There are none in the East. Perhaps another criteria change? <user> How about the north part of town? <system> There's the Hamilton Lodge. It's a moderate price guesthouse that has both free parking and wifi. Would you like to make a reservation? <user> Yes, please book it for one person for 4 nights starting Friday. <system> How many people are in your party?<user> Just myself for 4 nights starting friday please. <system> I made a reservation for 1 person at the hamilton lodge for 4 nights and for 1 person. Here's their phone number 01223365664. Have a nice stay!<user> Can I please get the reference number and I also need to book a train for Tuesday. <system> Sure! The reference number is 8PW074CW . As far as the train, where are you headed?<user> I am looking to leave Cambridge after 11:15 and travel to Broxbourne. <system> Which day do you want to travel?<user> I'd like to leave on tuesday, and could you give me the travel time? <system> Yes! Trains from Cambridge to Broxbourne have a travel duration of 60 minutes. The most suitable for you appears to be TR2368, leaving Cambridge on Tuesday at 12:01. Would that work?<user> That will work for me. I dont want to book just yet, though. Thanks for your help. Good bye. <system>
